document.discussion_title: Salim Khan defends Salman's appointment as Olympic ambassador
document.topic_text: You are here: Home » Exclusives » Sports Salim Khan defends Salman's appointment as Olympic ambassador Please enable the javascript of your browser to see the video. URL: Comment Salman Khan's father Salim Khan today (April 26) defended his actor-son's appointment as goodwill ambassador of the Indian Olympic contingent. Salman's appointment has been criticised by some noted sports personalties of the country. Salim today (April 26) took to Twitter to support his son, who plays a wrestler in his upcoming film "Sultan". Salim also attacked Milkha Singh by saying that it is the Indian film industry will resurrected him. TIMES NOW spoke to Salim Khan soon after he tweeted controversy.
